mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userInfo ( user_id, goal, gender, age, shape, experience, location, frequency, duration ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{goal}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{shape}, #{experience}, #{location}, #{frequency}, #{duration} )
mapper.select: SELECT ui.user_id, ui.goal, ui.gender, ui.age, ui.shape, ui.experience, ui.location, ui.frequency, ui.duration, uik.keyword_code FROM userInfo ui LEFT JOIN userInfo_keyword uik ON ui.user_id = uik.user_id WHERE ui.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE userInfo SET goal = #{goal}, gender = #{gender}, age = #{age}, shape = #{shape}, experience = #{experience}, location = #{location}, frequency = #{frequency} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
